# b0ase.com AI API
# https://b0ase.com/api/ai

## Overview
b0ase.com implements the MetaWeb protocol: AI agents pay micropayments (satoshis) to access data.
Information has a price. This creates sustainable economics for content creators.

## Authentication
- Get API key: POST https://b0ase.com/api/ai/keys (requires account)
- Use header: Authorization: Bearer b0ai_...
- Fund key: POST https://b0ase.com/api/ai/keys/{id}/fund

## Endpoints
GET /api/ai - Documentation (free)
GET /api/ai/blog - List blog posts (1 sat)
GET /api/ai/blog/{slug} - Read blog post (2 sats)
GET /api/ai/portfolio - List projects (1 sat)
GET /api/ai/portfolio/{slug} - Read project (2 sats)

## Pricing
Currency: satoshis (1 sat = 0.00000001 BTC)
Typical costs: 1-5 sats per request
Fund balance at: https://b0ase.com/api-keys

## Response Format
{
  "success": true,
  "charged": { "cost_sats": 1, "remaining_balance": 99 },
  "data": { ... }
}

## Error Codes
401 - No API key
402 - Insufficient balance (Payment Required)
403 - Key revoked
404 - Not found

## Philosophy
The MetaWeb: The token is the product, the token is not the product.
Read more: https://b0ase.com/blog/metaweb-token-is-not-the-product

## Contact
hello@b0ase.com
